main event: On 28 August 1963, a luminous object was observed near Valparaiso, Chile, displaying various light characteristics.
interesting points: The object exhibited a circular pattern and had a bright-regular aspect at times, appearing flaming at others., It was seen at an altitude of approximately 20 to 30 degrees from the eastern side of the Observatory of Pago Hondo., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes from 23:00 to 23:30 hours before the object shot upwards and disappeared., The object was approximately 2 meters in diameter and left a long luminous trail during its movement., The sighting involved local astronomical observers and was investigated by NASA facilities.
